summary:
- Twelve years of professional experience in software development, testing, and customer support in multinational companies with multicultural teams.
- Throughout my career I fulfilled multiple roles in my projects and acted as an IT Business Analyst by eliciting requirements, designing solutions, documenting functional and technical requirements and creating time estimations for each project and solutions.
- Bachelor degree in Computer Science, fluent in the English language from graduating from High School in New York, USA.

Specialties:  Software Development in Multicultural Projects, Eliciting Requirements, Software Testing, Customer Support and Training.

courses.name: ND510 - Developing R6 Applications: Foundations Skills - Green Technology
ND520 - Building Web Applications with IBM Lotus Domino Designer - Green Technology
ND540 - Using Lotus Script in IBM Lotus Domino Applications - Green Technology

profile_positions.description:
★ Developing secure web-based application in IBM Lotus Domino 9 for one of the leading online scheduling software for the medical industry.
★ Refining user requirements for new functionalities and enhancements in the application.
★ Executing functional tests in each development and bug fix.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
★ Working Software Development Life Cycle experience acting as a key System Analyst in many SharePoint and Lotus Domino projects; Participating in the early stages eliciting requirements from stakeholders, refining the workflow process to better fit the SharePoint solution, designing user interface, development and user acceptance test of the project that managed approvals for renovations and maintenance in the Volvo Trucks factory.
★ Develop SharePoint 2010 sites using web parts, custom lists, and document libraries. Working with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create custom enhancements on current sites for customer satisfaction and efficiency.
★ Develop browser compatible forms using InfoPath 2010 and deployed to Form Library in SharePoint Sites.
★ Implement workflows in SharePoint Designer 2010.
★ Global trainer for Volvo Group University, on face to face and remote trainings, on SharePoint and Skype for Business tools. 
★ Eliciting requirements and provide detailed time estimation of work effort for each project.
★ Helping define customer needs and recommending solutions.
★ Working in a multicultural environment with team members in the U.S.A., Sweden, India, Poland and France
★ Provide prototype of InfoPath Forms and SharePoint sites for better understanding of user needs and objectives.
★ Facilitate live meetings and events according to best practices and available infrastructure.
★ Migration of SharePoint sites in between different locations working with Sharegate Migration Tool. 
★ Weekly project reporting of hours and activities.
★ Develop surveys in the Survey Gizmo tool with logic; create reports and exports for better understanding of results.

ABOUT HCL Technologies

HCL Technologies Limited is a multinational IT services company that offers services including IT consulting, enterprise transformation, remote infrastructure management, engineering and R&D, and business process outsourcing (BPO).
profile_positions.title: Application Specialist

profile_positions.description:
★ Created a Lotus Domino web interface for Volvo Cars USA to improve customer and brand relationship on returned car policy. Gathering requirements along with project manager, designing user interface according to the company`s guideline, development, testing and deployment.
★ Fulfills a critical role providing systems analysis and IT service and support, with a focus on the use of Lotus Notes in multiple business applications.
★ Addresses and resolves technical issues in applications and strives to improve functionality.
★ Eliciting requirements and creating or enhancing Lotus Notes applications.
★ Working in a multicultural environment with team members in the U.S.A., Sweden, India, Poland and France.
★ Experience with design, development, research, and problem-solving to meet client requirements.
★ Effectively managed CSV format files containing sales information, using Lotus Notes to extract data for use in multiple applications.
★ Leveraged the Survey Gizmo tool to develop and deploy surveys and gather requirements for new developments.

ABOUT VOLVO GROUP

The Volvo Group is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of trucks, buses, construction equipment and marine and industrial engines. The Group also provides complete solutions for financing and service. The Volvo Group, with its headquarters in Gothenburg,  employs about 100,000 people, has production facilities in 19 countries and sells its products in more than 190 markets.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
★ Engaged in website testing for a mobile social gaming network, as well as product sales and support; identified online problems and reported issues to development teams for fixes.
★ Verified and validated each carrier and cell phone, ensuring the ability to download content and complete billing; developed test case scenarios and executed functional tests on web systems.
★ Facilitated the development of new landing pages to showcase new products.
★ Applied Scrum methodologies on projects and secure gains in efficiency and productivity; created a test automation tool using Selenium and C# that was successful in moving the company from a manual testing mode to automated testing.

ABOUT PLAYPHONE

Playphone is the premier mobile game platform for the world's largest and fastest growing markets. Playphone operates game stores throughout Southeast Asia, Latin America, North America and Europe. Each store provides a highly localized social gaming experience, where gamers play and share games together. Playphone enables game developers to launch and monetize games globally with a single integration SDK.
profile_positions.title: Test Analyst

profile_positions.description:
★ Advanced quickly from an initial role as Intern to providing second level technical support for SAP and Oracle issues that included login and password resets.
★ Provided first and second-level support of Lotus Notes Clients and Lotus Notes Web Applications as a member of the Whirlpool Development Project Team. 
★ Led the development of completion estimates for custom development projects, using the CMMI methodology to create system change, test case documentation, technical and functional specifications.

ABOUT ACCENTURE

Accenture is a global management consulting, technology services and outsourcing company, with more than 336,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries. Combining unparalleled experience, comprehensive capabilities across all industries and business functions, and extensive research on the world’s most successful companies, Accenture collaborates with clients to help them become high-performance businesses and governments.
profile_positions.title: Junior System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
★ Supported an array of corporate systems spanning Windows, Microsoft Office, and all network connectivity.

★ Leveraged superior technical expertise to address issues with proprietary business applications.

ABOUT IBM

IBM is a global technology and innovation company headquartered in Armonk, NY. It is the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 400,000 employees serving clients in 170 countries. IBM offers a wide range of technology and consulting services; a broad portfolio of middleware for collaboration, predictive analytics, software development and systems management; and the world's most advanced servers and supercomputers.
